name: deoxygenation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of removing oxygen from a substance: The deoxygenation of the oceans could have a major impact on marine life. The drug is known to prevent excessive deoxygenation in the patient. See
deoxygenate
More examplesFewer examplesDeoxygenation tends to predominate under such conditions.Metabisulfite is a reducing substance that enhances the process of deoxygenation.Sickle cell anemia causes the normal red blood cells to form a sickle shape during periods of deoxygenation.
